page.title: 01The Area We Live In.
page.content: The villages of Meliden and Dyserth are located in the area that we are studying.They are found at the base of Graig Fawr 153metres and Moel Hiraddug 264metres. These limestone hills are the dominating feature of the landscape and in the past, have been exploited for various minerals. To the West,is the flat fertile plain of the Vale of Clwyd suitable for growing crops or rearing livestock. To the North,are the two popular seaside resorts of Rhyl and Prestatyn which provide the main source of employment for the inhabitants of both villages. The following pages were completed by: Matthew,Richard,Lucy,Joanne,Jill,Lisa, Merith,Llinos,Chloe,Cathy,Zoe,Adele, Ruth,Lynda,Rachel,Cheryl,Steven,Robert Mark,Nigel,David,Leon,Geraint,Kenneth, Huw,Gary,Gavin,Peter,Kevin and Maqbool
